description: Numbers n such that n and n+1 both have 4 divisors.
references: D. Wells, Curious and interesting numbers, Penguin Books.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: 14 and 15 both have 4 as number of divisors and are consecutive.
